Property.Name: HeaderContents
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT INTO [Role] VALUES(@name) SELECT @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY() RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT INTO [User] VALUES(@name, @email, @passwordHash) SELECT @id = SCOPE_IDENTITY() RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT INTO [UserRole] VALUES(@userId, (SELECT Id FROM Role WHERE Name = @roleName)) RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: DELETE FROM Category WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: DELETE FROM Lesson WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: DELETE FROM Test WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: DELETE FROM TestOption WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: DELETE FROM [UserRole] WHERE UserId = @userId AND RoleId = (SELECT Id FROM Role WHERE Name = @roleName); RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Category WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM [Course] INNER JOIN Category ON Course.CategoryId = Category.Id WHERE Course.Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM [Course] INNER JOIN Category ON Course.CategoryId = Category.Id RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Lesson WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Lesson WHERE CourseId = @courseId RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT @id = [Role].Id, @name = [Role].Name FROM [Role] WHERE ((@name IS NULL) OR (Name = @name)) AND ((@id IS NULL) OR (Id = @id)) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM Test WHERE CourseId = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 1 * FROM TestOption WHERE Id = @id RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM TestOption WHERE TestId = @testId RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM Test WHERE CourseId = @courseId RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT @id = [User].Id, @email = [User].Email, @name = [User].Name, @passwordHash = [User].PasswordHash FROM [User] WHERE ((@email IS NULL) OR (Email = @email)) AND ((@name IS NULL) OR (Name = @name)) AND ((@id IS NULL) OR (Id = @id)) RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT Name FROM Role WHERE Id IN (SELECT RoleId FROM UserRole WHERE UserId = @userId) RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM UserRole WHERE UserId = @userId AND RoleId = (SELECT Id FROM Role WHERE Name = @roleName) RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Category SET Name=ISNULL(@name,Name) WHERE id=@id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE [Course] SET CategoryId = @categoryId, Description=ISNULL(@description,Description), Name=ISNULL(@name,Name) WHERE id=@id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Lesson SET Name = ISNULL(@name, Name), Content = ISNULL(@content, Content) WHERE id = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE [Role] SET Name=ISNULL(@name, Name) WHERE id=@id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE Test SET Question = ISNULL(@question, Question) WHERE id = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE TestOption SET Name = ISNULL(@name, Name), IsChecked = ISNULL(@isChecked, IsChecked) WHERE id = @id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN UPDATE [User] SET Email=ISNULL(@email,Email), Name=ISNULL(@name,Name), PasswordHash=ISNULL(@passwordHash, PasswordHash) WHERE id=@id END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
